attributes.action: Bring in the Army to support police and stop the riots
attributes.additional_details:
It is clear that there is insufficient police to deal with the problems on the streets and a lot of power is out of their hands due to stupid and pathetic EU policies, health and safety and human rights even after relinquishing all rights after commiting some of these crimes.

The armed forces should be brought in on mass to

a, show a force bigger and more devastating than the rioters can possibly understand

b, Bulk up the services and protection of the genral public and public services

c, sort out our once great British streets again once and for all

d, bring back British pride in our country and its forces

If they get away with it now they always will!!!
